entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
